summary: Standalone Conversion Of BurntBiscuits Red and Black Dragonscale.
descriptionHtml:
I did not create this skin all the REAL hardwork was done by BurntBiscuit, i have simply made it a standalone, craftable and temperable version.

There should be no issues, works with all races but i didnt test orc or kahjit, so let me know if they dont work.
Its a nice looking subtle skim imo and i have been using it for quite some time, so mucho thanks Mr Biscuits

Heres the original retex version > Red and Black Dragonscale
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/678

For Manual Install

Place Esp in > Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

Place Textures And Meshes Into relevent folders
Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\armor\\dragonscale\\bloodscale
Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\armor\\dragonscale\\bloodscale
author: zaph72
